items.title: Just 8 months in, India’s vibe-coding startup Emergent claims ARR of over $100M
items.summary: Indian vibe-coding platform Emergent was launched just eight months ago, and it now says it's generating annual recurring revenue of more than $100 million, thanks to surging demand by small businesses and non-technical users.

items.title: Warner Bros. Discovery gives Paramount one week to present its ‘best and final’ offer

items.summary:
Earlier this month Anker debuted its all-new foldable 25W Qi2 Prime 3-in-1 Wireless Charging Station, and after coming way impressed with our time testing it, we wanted to make sure the launch deal was on the radar. You can still score this new travel and desktop-ready charger at a discount alongside much of the ongoing holiday deals we featured yesterday.

items.title: Huge $715 discount strikes Lenovo’s OLED Legion Pro 5i RTX 5070 gaming laptop today (All-time low)
items.summary:
We are now tracking a deal at Lenovo that drops one of its Legion Pro 5i gaming laptops with an RTX 5070 GPU down to $1,259.99 shipped once you enter promo code PDLIVE26 during checkout. This particular notebook with an OLED display typically goes for $1,975, so you’re looking at a whopping $715 discount on it at the moment with the promo code. We’ve seen the variant of this laptop with an IPS display go for less in the past, but this one with an OLED panel has never been this low. Best Buy currently has some third-party listings for the same machine with an RTX 5060 itself for $1,499, making this an unmissable deal at Lenovo. Head below for more details.

more…

items.title: Danaher agrees to acquire US medical tech company Masimo for $9.9B, paying $180 per share, a nearly 40% premium on February 13's close, set to close in H2 2026 (Stuart Biggs/Bloomberg)
items.summary:
Stuart Biggs / Bloomberg:
Danaher agrees to acquire US medical tech company Masimo for $9.9B, paying $180 per share, a nearly 40% premium on February 13's close, set to close in H2 2026  —  Danaher Corp. agreed to buy US medical technology firm Masimo Corp., in a deal with an enterprise value of about $9.9 billion.

items.summary:
While we are still tracking a host of ongoing Presidents Day Switch game deals at Amazon and elsewhere live down below, Super Mario Galaxy + Super Mario Galaxy 2 has just hit its best price ever on Amazon as of this morning. Regularly $70, you can now land proper U.S. physical copy of this one for Switch library down at $59 shipped – this deal is also live at Walmart now as well. While we have been tracking this same price over at Woot for a U.S. copy, this is the first time we have tracked the game down this low directly on Amazon. Head below for more hangover Presidents Day game deals.

items.title: Don’t miss Alienware’s 18-inch Area-51 RTX 5070 300Hz gaming laptop while it’s $600 off today
items.summary:
We just spotted a deal at Amazon that drops Alienware’s Area-51 18-inch gaming laptop with an RTX 5070 GPU down to $2,349.99 shipped. That’s a straight $600 off its $2,950 usual going rate, making this one of the lowest prices we’ve tracked so far. It’s only dipped lower once before, and today’s deal is just $50 shy of that all-time low. It’s an easy recommendation at this price, and it’s a particularly good deal considering Dell is currently charging the same $2,350 for a lower-spec variant with an Ultra 7 processor and RTX 5060 GPU at its online store. There’s plenty to like about this machine, and you can learn more about it in detail below.

more…

items.title: Bring the 16-bit LEGO Mario and Yoshi set to your collection while down at its $104 low (Reg. $130)
items.summary:
As part of the Amazon Presidents Day LEGO deals we spotted, one notable standout that deserves the spotlight is the LEGO Super Mario World: Mario & Yoshi at $103.99 shipped. Normally $130 at full price, especially direct from LEGO where discounts are extremely rare, we last saw this same all-time low price appear in September 2025 and continue through mid-October. It’s coming back around in 2026, giving you another shot at shaving $26 off the tag for the best price we have tracked.

more…

items.title: Sonos Presidents Day deals: Era 300 wireless speakers $100 off, Arc Ultra Soundbar $200 off, more
items.summary:
Amazon launched a notable Sonos home theater gear sale earlier this month, but many of the best deals are still live and we wanted to get them front and center for Presidents Day. Through today, as part of its holiday event, Amazon is offering up $200 off a range of Sonos gear, be it on that new Arc Ultra sound bar for your theater space, or just to upgrade the setup you already have with its lauded Era series wireless speakers, the deals are still flying. 

more…

items.title: Aventon’s Pace 500.3 step-through cruiser e-bike is the last of the legacy models in stock at its $1,499 yearly low
items.summary:
Aventon is still offering its Pace 500.3 Step-Through Cruiser e-bike at $1,499 shipped, after the Aventure 2 and Level 2 e-bikes have officially gone out of stock (and might be officially getting discontinued). Before all the new e-bikes were launched over 2025, this model carried a $1,799 full price, and has been regularly discounted to $1,499 over the last year, while holding the discount since 2026 began. While we have seen it going as low as $1,399 in 2024, the $300 markdown here is the best price we have tracked since then, giving you a final chance to pick it up here before joining the Aventure 2 and Level 2 e-bikes.

more…
